S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1072

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. ORTIZ -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Mental Health

       AN ACT to amend part R2 of chapter 62 of the laws of 2003, amending  the
         mental hygiene law and the state finance law relating to the community
         mental  health  support  and  workforce  reinvestment  program and the
         membership of subcommittees for mental  health  of  community  service
         boards and the duties of such subcommittees and creating the community
         health  and  workforce reinvestment account, in relation to the effec-
         tive date thereof

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section  7  of part R2 of chapter 62 of the laws of 2003,
    2  amending the mental hygiene law and the state finance  law  relating  to
    3  the  community  mental health support and workforce reinvestment program
    4  and the membership of  subcommittees  for  mental  health  of  community
    5  service  boards  and  the  duties of such subcommittees and creating the
    6  community mental health and workforce reinvestment account,  as  amended
    7  by section 2 of part C of chapter 111 of the laws of 2010, is amended to
    8  read as follows:
    9    S 7. This act shall take effect immediately and shall expire March 31,
   10  2013  when  upon  such  date  the provisions of this act shall be deemed
   11  repealed; PROVIDED FURTHER, THAT SECTIONS TWO AND SIX OF THIS ACT  SHALL
   12  EXPIRE  MARCH  31,  2018  WHEN  UPON  SUCH  DATE  THE PROVISIONS OF SUCH
   13  SECTIONS SHALL BE DEEMED REPEALED.
   14    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03962-01-1
